#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int temp,k,j,i,a[100000];
        long long int N;
        scanf("%lld",&N);
        for(i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        }
        for(k=0;k<=N-1;k++)
        {
            temp=a[k];
            j = k-1;
            while((temp<a[j])&&(j>=0))
            {
                a[j+1] = a[j];
                j = j-1;
            }
            a[j+1] = temp;
        }
        if(N%2==0)
        printf("-1\n");
        else
        printf("%d\n",a[N/2]);
    }
    return 0;
}
